title: Change Women section text color to black on Home page

requirements.text: Update the Women empowerment section on the Home page (the “Empowering Women Through Griha Mahila Udyog” section in `frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx`) so that the paragraph/body text renders in black instead of white.

quotes: change the women section colour to black

acceptanceCriteria: On the Home page, the paragraph text in the “Empowering Women Through Griha Mahila Udyog” section is black (not white).
No other sections on the Home page have their text colors changed.
The change is implemented via Tailwind/CSS classes in `frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx` (e.g., removing/replacing `text-white` and `prose-p:text-white` within that section).

constraints: Do not modify any files under `frontend/src/components/ui`.
Do not modify any files listed as immutable in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
nonGoals: Do not change the background image, overlay opacity, or layout of the Women empowerment section.
Do not change product/cart behavior or any non-UI logic.
